participant_1.name: Frank
participant_1.personality: outgoing, easygoing, and enjoys sharing stories from his past.
participant_1.background: i go gambling in my spare time. i've been retired for a years. i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days.

participant_2.name: Kevin
participant_2.personality: hardworking, family-oriented, and has a good sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i'm a plumber. my wife and kids are the best. i've three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

content.text: hello, how are you doing today? i am well.
